message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: Please sort out all African countries involved in the "Belt and Road" initiative and their capitals as of June 2025, and query the surface area (in sq.km, using 2022 statistics, rounded to an integer), population density (people/sq.km of land area, using 2022 statistics, rounded to an integer), total population (in thousand, using 2023 statistics, rounded to an integer), and the proportion of merchandise trade in GDP (in percentage of GDP, using 2023 statistics, rounded to one decimal place) of these countries according to the statistics of the World Bank. 

Please output the sorted data in the format of one Markdown table. The column names in the table are: Country, Capital City, Surface Area (km²), Population Density (people/km² of land area), Total Population (thousands), Merchandise Trade (% of GDP).
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```

Assistant: 
<think>

To find all African countries involved in the "Belt and Road" initiative and their capitals as of June 2025, I'll search through reliable sources. </think>
<search> all african countries involved in belt and road initiative and their capitals as of june 2025 </search>

Search query: all african countries involved in belt and road initiative and their capitals as of june 2025

Countries of the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) The countries (excluding Palestine) of the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) are spread across all continents: Africa – 53 countries; Central Asia – 6 countries ...

China in Africa: June 2025 | Council on Foreign Relations CAETE 2025 was rooted in South-South cooperation, with the China-Africa Business Council organizing a special exhibition on the matter.

African Member States of the Belt and Road Initiative (as of April 2022) Out of 54 African countries, 52 have already signed a BRI (Belt & Road Initiative) Memorandum of Understanding with China by April 2022.

Africa's Top Import Partners: A Changing Economic Landscape This ... As the data shows, China has emerged as the dominant trading partner, leading in the majority of African countries — represented in red. This ...

Countries of the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) The countries (excluding Palestine) of the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) are spread across all continents: Africa – 53 countries; Central Asia – 6 countries ...
